description: Identifier of the maintenance task or template this log pertains to.
Identifier of the schedule variant within the task/template used for recurrence.
Sequence number used to order this schedule within its maintenance nesting/group.
Identifier of the work order associated to this maintenance occurrence.
Current state of the entry or related work order (e.g., open, closed, cancelled).
Grouping code for nested preventive maintenance that links related schedules; confirm with SME.
Description text for the nested maintenance group.
Timestamp when this maintenance log record was created.
Date/time the associated work order was closed; null if still open.
Cycle number within the recurring maintenance program for this task.
User who created the record.
Date/time the record was added.
User who last updated the record.
Date/time the record was last updated.
Reference to an alternate or parent maintenance template used instead of the primary; confirm with SME.
Saved completion date/time of the most recent performance used for scheduling.
Calculated next due date for the maintenance based on the schedule.
Equipment meter reading recorded at last completion to support meter-based scheduling.
Meter reading at which the next maintenance is due, if meter-based scheduling applies.
Next cycle index or interval to apply in the maintenance program; confirm with SME.
Identifier of any currently open preventive maintenance work order derived from this schedule.
Timestamp when the most recent work order was created from this maintenance schedule.
Logical deletion flag indicating whether the record is inactive/soft-deleted.
